data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Poore, Gary C. B. (2009): A new species of Chaetiliidae (Crustacea: Isopoda: Valvifera) from the Río de la Plata estuary, Argentina-Uruguay, and reconsideration of Macrochiridothea and Chiriscus. Zootaxa 2119: 51-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188066
